locales.description: Posts that are only a pushpin. By default, this labeler hides those from your feeds.
locales.name: Pushpin only

locales.description: Posts that include a pushpin emoji but also other content. These are not hidden or "warned" by default but if you don't want to see them, you can change the settings.
locales.name: Pushpin and other content
